Key Match Events: Jason Heyward hit a go-ahead, two-run homer
Alex Bregman and Kyle Tucker each added a solo home run
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Espada was emotional as the final out was recorded
Dan Wilson said the message is that there's a lot of different scenarios that could still take place
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jason Heyward signed with the Astros last month after his release by the Dodgers
Others: Framber Valdez (15-7) permitted eight hits and three runs in 5 2/3 innings for the win
Justin Turner and Jorge Polanco each had season-high four hits for their respective teams
